Verses: 1 aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Baabilonmel Varakkanda Baaram.
2 uyarndha Parvadhaththinmel Kodiyetrungal; Uraththa Saththamittu Janangalai Varavazhaiyungal; Avargal Prabukkalin Vaasalgalukkul Pravesippadharku Saigai Kaattungal.
3 naan Parisuththamaakkinavargalukku Kattalai Koduththen; En Kobaththai Niraivetra En Paraakkiramasaaligalai Azhaiththum Irukkiren; Avargal En Magaththuvaththinaale Kalikoorugiravargal Engiraar.

4 thiralaana Janangalin Saththaththukkoththa Vegu Koottaththin Iraichchalum, Koottappatta Jaadhigaludaiya Raajyangalin Amaliyaana Iraichchalum Malaigalil Ketkappadugiradhu; Senaigalin Karththar Yuththaraanuvaththai Lakkampaarkkiraar.
5 karththar Varugiraar; Avarudaiya Kobaththin Aayudhangalum, Dhesaththaiyellaam Azhikka, Vaanankavizhndha Kadaiyaandhara Dhesaththilirundhu Varugiradhu.
6 alarungal, Karththarin Naal Sameebamaayirukkiradhu, Adhu Sarvavallavaridaththilirundhu Magaa Sangaaramaai Varum.
7 aadhalaal Ellaak Kaigalum Negizhndhu, Ellaa Manusharin Irudhayamum Karaindhupom.

8 avargal Thigiladaivaargal; Vedhanaigalum Vaadhaigalum Avargalaip Pidikkum; Pillaiperugiravalaippola Vedhanaippaduvaargal; Oruvaraiyoruvar Bramiththuppaarppaargal; Avargal Mugangal Neruppaana Mugangalaayirukkum.
9 idho, Dhesaththaip Paazhaakki, Adhin Paavigalai Adhilirundhu Azhippadharkaagak Karththarudaiya Naal Kadooramum, Moorkkamum, Ukkirakobamumaai Varugiradhu.
10 vaanaththin Natchaththirangalum Raasigalum Oli Kodaadhirukkum; Sooriyan Udhikkaiyil Irundupom; Sandhiran Oli Kodaadhirukkum.
11 paavaththinimiththam Ulagaththaiyum, Akkiramaththinimiththam Dhunmaarkkaraiyum Naan Dhandiththu, Agangaararin Perumaiyai Ozhiyappanni, Kodiyarin Idumbaith Thaazhththuven.
12 purushanaip Pasumponnilum, Manushanai Oppeerin Thangaththilum Abooruvamaakkuven.
13 idhinimiththam Senaigalin Karththarudaiya Ukkiraththinaal Avarudaiya Kadunkobaththin Naalile Boomi Thannidaththaivittu Neengumpadi Vaanaththai Adhirappannuven.
14 thuraththappatta Velimaanaippolum, Yaarum Serkkaadha Aattaippolum Iruppaargal; Avaravar Thangal Janaththandaikkup Poga Mugaththaith Thiruppi, Avaravar Thangal Dhesaththukku Odippovaargal.
15 adappattavanevanum Kuththundu, Avargalai Serndhirundhavanevanum Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaan.
16 avargal Kuzhandhaigal Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Modhiyadikkappadum; Avargal Veedugal Kollaiyidappadum; Avargal Manaivigal Avamaanappaduvaargal.
17 idho, Naan Avargalukku Virodhamaai Medhiyarai Ezhuppuven; Avargal Velliyai Madhiyaamalum, Ponninmel Piriyappadaamalum,
18 villugalaal Ilaignarai Sidhaiththuviduvaargal; Karppakkaniyinmel Avargal Iranguvadhillai; Avargal Kan Pillaigalaith Thappaviduvadhumillai.
19 raajyangalukkul Alangaaramum Kaltheyarudaiya Pradhaana Magimaiyumaagiya Baabilonaanadhu Dhevanaal Sodhomum Gomoraavum Kavizhkkappattadhupola Kavizhkkappadum.
20 ini Orupodhum Adhil Oruvarum Kudiyeruvadhumillai, Thalaimuraithorum Adhil Oruvarum Thangith Tharippadhumillai; Ange Arabiyan Koodaarampoduvadhumillai; Ange Meyppar Mandhaiyai Marippadhumillai.
21 kaattumirugangal Ange Paduththukkollum; Oolaiyidum Praanigal Avargal Veedugalai Nirappum, Kottaangal Ange Kudikollum; Kaattaadu Ange Thullum.
22 avargal Paazhaana Maaligaigalil Origal Oolaiyidum; Valusarppangal Avargal Selvikkaiyaana Aramanaigalil Egamaaik Koodum; Adhinkaalam Seekkiram Varum, Adhin Naatkal Neediththiraadhu Engiraar.
